title: Violet's Perplexing Puzzles
description: Vi's mission is up and running, but her problems are far from over. An old enemy reappears and asks for help. The fate of two orphaned children still hangs in the balance. A new resident brings new dilemmas. In her work and her personal life, Vi faces issues unlike any she has dealt with before, and she must look into many hearts to discover the truths that lie within.
author: Martha Finley
